sense.gloss: to anticipate, to expect, to estimate, to count on, to allow for, to take into account
to place confidence in, to put trust in, to trust
to find promising, to see good prospects (in)
to set one's eye on (e.g. prey), to mark (e.g. as a victim), to hold spellbound

sdata.j: ↑駅↑↓えき↓まで↑１↑↓いち↓↑時間↑↓じかん↓を↑見込↑↓|みこ↓む|。
sdata.e: Allow an hour to get to the station.

sdata.j: このミシンのこつをの|み↑込↑↓こ↓む|のに、どのくらい↑時間↑↓じかん↓がかかるのか。
sdata.e: How long does it take to get the hang of this sewing machine?

sdata.j: ↑詳↑↓くわ↓しいことが↑全部↑↓ぜんぶ↓わかるまでは、あわててその↑場↑↓ば↓にふ|みこむ|な。↑見当↑↓けんとう↓がつくまでは、↑慎重↑↓しんちょう↓にかまえておれ。
sdata.e: Don't rush into the situation until you have all the details; hold your horses until you know where you are going.

sdata.j: ↑食↑↓た↓べ↑物↑↓もの↓は↑飲↑↓の↓|み↑込↑↓こ↓む|↑前↑↓まえ↓にかまなければならない。
sdata.e: Food should be chewed before being swallowed.

sdata.j: ↑食↑↓た↓べ↑物↑↓もの↓を↑飲↑↓の↓|み↑込↑↓こ↓む|とのどが↑痛↑↓いた↓みます。
sdata.e: My throat hurts when I swallow.

sdata.j: ↑歯↑↓は↓を↑食↑↓く↓い↑縛↑↓しば↓る、↑喉元↑↓のどもと↓までせりあがった↑感情↑↓かんじょう↓を↑強引↑↓ごういん↓に↑飲↑↓の↓|み↑込↑↓こ↓む|。
sdata.e: He grits his teeth and forces back his growing fear.
